fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • The body that recognises the qualifications required to join the Register of Architects is the Architects Registration Board, not the Royal Institute of British Architects as we implied (Architecture, 8 June, page 14, University Guide 2020). • John Boyne’s latest novel, My Brother’s Name Is Jessica, was misnamed as A Boy Called Jessica in a feature about young adult books (Battle lines, 15 June, page 6, Review). • Other recently corrected articles include: Darby’s, London SW11: ‘Heroically good’ – restaurant review US schools accused of censoring climate crisis message in graduation speeches The answer to the UK’s homelessness crisis is painfully simple: give people homes Quick crossword No 15,322
